00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_BINARY_OARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BINARY_OARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008

00019 #include <ostream>
00020 #include <boost/archive/binary_oarchive_impl.hpp>
00021 
00022 namespace boost { 
00023 namespace archive {
00024 
00025 // do not derive from this class.  If you want to extend this functionality
00026 // via inhertance, derived from binary_oarchive_impl instead.  This will
00027 // preserve correct static polymorphism.
00028 class binary_oarchive : 
00029     public binary_oarchive_impl<
00030         binary_oarchive, std::ostream::char_type, std::ostream::traits_type
00031     >
00032 {
00033 public:
00034     binary_oarchive(std::ostream & os, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00035         binary_oarchive_impl<
00036             binary_oarchive, std::ostream::char_type, std::ostream::traits_type
00037         >(os, flags)
00038     {}
00039     binary_oarchive(std::streambuf & bsb, unsigned int flags = 0) :
00040         binary_oarchive_impl<
00041             binary_oarchive, std::ostream::char_type, std::ostream::traits_type
00042         >(bsb, flags)
00043     {}
00044 };
00045 
00046 typedef binary_oarchive naked_binary_oarchive;
00047 
00048 } // namespace archive
00049 } // namespace boost
00050 
00051 // required by export
00052 BOOST_SERIALIZATION_REGISTER_ARCHIVE(boost::archive::binary_oarchive)
00053 BOOST_SERIALIZATION_USE_ARRAY_OPTIMIZATION(boost::archive::binary_oarchive)
00054 
00055 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BINARY_OARCHIVE_HPP
